class.rdfs:comment: Instructions that explain how to achieve a result by performing a sequence of steps.
class.rdfs:label: HowTo

schema:estimatedCost.rdfs:comment: The estimated cost of the supply or supplies consumed when performing instructions.
schema:estimatedCost.rdfs:label: estimatedCost

schema:performTime.rdfs:comment: The length of time it takes to perform instructions or a direction (not including time to prepare the supplies), in ISO 8601 duration format.
schema:performTime.rdfs:label: performTime

schema:prepTime.rdfs:comment: The length of time it takes to prepare the items to be used in instructions or a direction, in ISO 8601 duration format.
schema:prepTime.rdfs:label: prepTime

schema:step.rdfs:comment: A single step item (as HowToStep, text, document, video, etc.) or a HowToSection.
schema:step.rdfs:label: step

schema:steps.rdfs:comment: A single step item (as HowToStep, text, document, video, etc.) or a HowToSection (originally misnamed 'steps'; 'step' is preferred).
schema:steps.rdfs:label: steps

schema:supply.rdfs:comment: A sub-property of instrument. A supply consumed when performing instructions or a direction.
schema:supply.rdfs:label: supply

schema:tool.rdfs:comment: A sub property of instrument. An object used (but not consumed) when performing instructions or a direction.
schema:tool.rdfs:label: tool

schema:totalTime.rdfs:comment: The total time required to perform instructions or a direction (including time to prepare the supplies), in ISO 8601 duration format.
schema:totalTime.rdfs:label: totalTime

schema:yield.rdfs:comment: The quantity that results by performing instructions. For example, a paper airplane, 10 personalized candles.
schema:yield.rdfs:label: yield
